name: birb survivors
description:
Submission for 2022 Hitpointti Game Jam.

Collect chicks from around the grassland and lead them to a Faraday's cage to save them from horrible magical lightning. Avoid the terrible geese trying to peck you and shoot eggs at them. Be careful not to step on the chicks following you, they will get scared!

  • WASD/Arrows: move
  • mouse: choose shooting direction, click to shoot

Music/Sounds by Adi "Blingley" Saikkonen

Programming by Gracmit

Graphics by nofuu
